entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape's face is mentioned as being on the surface again.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore glances down into Snape's face and then up at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking into Dumbledore's eyes and asking a question.

entities.name: volde-mort
entities.description: Volde-mort is mentioned as the one Snape supposedly stopped supporting.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville's parents are mentioned by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore glances down into Snape's face.
Harry asks Dumbledore why he thinks Snape stopped supporting Volde-mort.
Dumbledore advises Harry not to speak about Neville's parents.
